description:
While corporate America once thought being politically correct, despite being morally incorrect, was the best financial move, that could not be further from the truth. Subsequently, the past that consisted of woke marketing being shoved down the masses' throats is no longer the status quo and many organizations are learning that the hard way.

San Fransico Pride has announced it’s facing financial trouble after many sponsors pulled out of the event, including Comcast and Anheuser-Busch.

San Francisco Pride is facing a $300,000 shortfall after major sponsors pulled out of the 2025 event.

- Meta
- Comcast
- Anheuser-Busch (Budweiser, Beck’s)
- La Crema Wines
- Diageo (Guinness, Smirnoff)

All have withdrawn support.

The world is
title: San Francisco Pride facing MAJOR financial troubles after these big corporate sponsors decided it's not worth it anymore

description:
Can you imagine the outrage among the left if it was the right blowing up American car dealerships across the country? To this day, they are still talking about Jan. 6 so you can only imagine. Nonetheless, these people only condemn “terrorism” when it’s politically incorrect and that makes this so much worse.

This is why Scott Jennings said what needed to be said, which is that there is an emotional mob “willing to take things into their own hands....firebombing, and otherwise vandalizing cars, car dealerships, and charging stations."

Scott Jennings TORCHES the left’s terroristic attacks on Elon Musk and Tesla:

"That's the American Left right now—one angry mob after another, willing to take things into their own hands—up to keying, firebombing, and other
title: Scott Jennings puts left-wingers on CNN in their place as they celebrate the terrorist attacks against Tesla owners

description:
There are many problems with the left but one of their main issues is that they live in an echo chamber and cannot stand it the moment someone dares to disagree with them politically. So while Gavin Newsom is not even remotely what one should consider a “moderate,” the fact that he is trying to appeal to them, causes disgrace among the woke left.

A Californian, while wearing a red that stated “YOU ARE ON STOLEN LAND,” called out Newsom for suddenly not being Progressive enough, as he has yet to have the likes of AOC or Jasmine Crockett on his little podcast.

Californian says she is afraid of losing her state because Governor Gavin Newsom is platforming Charlie Kirk and not Jasmine Crockett.

“I know that a lot of us think that we're super safe in California
title: CA influencer goes bananas on Gavin Newsom, claims he's not progressive enough and, quote,  "We're losing California"

description: Yesterday, Trump spoke with Putin about a potential ceasefire with Ukraine. Today’s show breaks down the misleading claims the media has made.
title: Watch: Here are the media claims about the Trump/Putin call vs. THE TRUTH

description:
The left woke up one day and decided to declare masculinity toxic. However, the problem is that you don’t tend to win over votes when slandering half the country like that. Nonetheless, Progressives did everything in their power to emasculate the masses. And in Tim Walz’s case, he put tampons in the men's restroom. That was pathetic enough but what makes it even more delusional is that he is now claiming that conservatives fear him because of this.

Walz went on Newsom’s podcast to slander Trump voters as misogynistic and let’s just say he did the left no favors.

Tampon Tim Walz on his masculinity: “I think I scare them a little bi
title: Tampon Tim Walz says you FEAR his "masculinity." Also, he can totally kick all of our butts

description:
For reasons known to only the general consultants looking to squeeze money out of him by convincing him that he still has a future in politics, Tim Walz is all over the place. He's doing podcasts. He's touring America. He's giving performances where he celebrates American businesses failing because the company's CEO has a different political opinion than him. Walz thinks it's hilarious to see Tesla's stock falling. Then Elon Musk responded. I don't think Walz finds that as funny.

The billionaires who control the Democrat Party and decide what they think have settled on Cousin Elon as their boogeyman. Musk is attempting to dismantle the bureaucracy they spent decades putting into place, so they spread fake news that his team is exploiting your personal information (only Democrats are allowed to do that) and that Elon is a Nazi. As a result, Democrat sympathizers have been van
title: Elon Musk SAVAGES Tim Walz after the failed candidate celebrates Democrats terrorizing Tesla families and employees

description:
Americans view our country as being on the right track more than they have for twenty years, thanks to Cousin Elon helping to root out the waste, fraud, and/or abuse our tax dollars are being spent on. So, of course, Democrats think there is something wrong with Americans. Chuck Schumer said as much while hanging out with the shrill harpies from The View. It's a typical politician's attitude that Barstool CEO Dave Portnoy, aka Davey Politics, has the perfect solution for.

Schumer, after bending the knee to Donald Trump over the continuing resolution debate, has angered his base. He had to cancel his book tour on antisemitism because instead of Democrats protesting it over Israel, they were going to protest it over his incompetent leadership. Chuckles needed to swing for the fences,
title: After Chuck Schumer's unhinged tirade against American taxpayers, Barstool CEO Dave Portnoy offers the only common sense solution
